Christian Fuentes

Award-Winning
Chino Hills, CA RealtorÂ®

Christian Fuentes, co-owner of RE/MAX Top Producers in Diamond Bar, CA, and a trusted Realtor in Chino Hills, brings over 20 years of real estate expertise helping buyers, sellers, and investors achieve their goals. Known for rehabbing and flipping more than 300 properties in the past eight years, Christian has consistently delivered results, averaging 140 sales per year and earning placement in the prestigious RE/MAX Diamond Club and recognition among the Top 10 RE/MAX teams in California and Hawaii. Together with his wife and business partner, Jeannette, Christian leads three RE/MAX Top Producers offices in Diamond Bar, Brea, and Chino Hills, combining award-winning service with a family-focused approach to real estate.
